articles.title: Video: Hear Nikki Haley's response to question about cause of Civil War - CNN
articles.description: Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley was pressed about whether slavery was a cause of the American Civil War during a campaign event in New Hampshire.

articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Barack Obama Reveals Favorite Movies, Books of 2023: ‘Oppenheimer,’ ‘Air’ and ‘Leave the World Behind’ Make List - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The former president's other favorites from this year included 'American Fiction,' 'Anatomy of a Fall' and 'The Holdovers.'
articles.content:
It’s that time of year again, when Barack Obama annually shares his favorite movies, books and music.
“As I usually do during this time of year, I wanted to share my favorite books, movies, and musi… [+1938 chars]
